name: Celestial Fire
description: Sends out a spiral of three explosive Solar energy blasts.

name: Phoenix Dive
description: Dive to the ground and create a healing burst.

name: Incinerator Snap
description: Snap your fingers to create a fan of burning sparks.

name: Chain Lightning
description: Release a bolt of lightning that chains to nearby enemies.

name: Ball Lightning
description: Throw a Arc ball that zaps enemies.

name: Entropic Pull
description: Drains energy from enemies and pulls them closer.

name: Pocket Singularity
description: Creates a Void explosion that weakens enemies.

name: Devour Strike
description: Defeating enemies heals you and grants grenade energy.

name: Penumbral Blast
description: Send out a freezing projectile that slows targets.

name: Glacial Spike
description: Launch a Stasis crystal that freezes on impact.

name: Shiver Strike
description: Charge forward and shatter enemies with Stasis.

name: Grapple Melee
description: Pull yourself to a surface or enemy.

name: Strand Strike
description: Fire a rope of Strand that suspends targets.

name: Severing Slash
description: Sever enemies with Strand, dealing damage over time.
